prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon with a flat body and bright yellow accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a fish but has unique electric powers.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in muddy waters and has a quirky personality.
Generate a creature that has a round shape and is mostly orange with white spots.
Show me a Pokemon that can camouflage itself in wetlands and has a playful nature.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a pancake but has lively electric abilities.
Give me a design of a Pokemon that enjoys hiding in lakes and ambushing prey.
